column4: is a Chilean city and commune located in the province of the same name
column5: in Valparaíso Region ("Fifth Region" of Chile). It lies on the route between Santiago and Chile's primary border crossing with Argentina by way of the summit of the Uspallata Pass in the Andes mountain range.

column1: Los Andes principal economy is based on mining and agriculture
column2: with vineyards and grapes being the principal fruit export.  Copper and other minor minerals production is handled by Codelco Chile. Until 2004
